Our Services

Remember us for Wedding Party, Corporate Gathering, Picnics, Rental Services and many more.

wedding party

We offer catering services for wedding party, bartabanda and other ocassions with exiquisite decorations and delicious dishes. Make your events memorable with our catering.

gathering & events

We also provide catering services for corporate gathering and normal house events which may include your friends or relatives. You can contact us for any picnic services as well.

Rental Services

Apart from Catering Services, we als provide Rental Services. Tents, Carpets, Dishes, Canopy, Tables, Chairs(plastic and banquet) are available at a affordable rate.
